meanings.definition: The dried acorn cups of the valonia oak, used in tanning and dyeing.
meanings.sent1: I collected some valonias to use in my tanning project.
meanings.sent2: The tanner purchased a batch of valonias for his leatherwork.
meanings.sent3: The valonias decided to throw a party in the tanning vat.
meanings.sent4: The valonias scattered around the workshop, coloring everything like dye.
meanings.sent5: The sweet smell of valonias filled the air, reminding me of the tanning process.

meanings.definition: A type of oak tree native to the Mediterranean region.
meanings.sent1: The valonias in the park provide ample shade during hot days.
meanings.sent2: Many animals seek refuge under the branches of the valonias.
meanings.sent3: The valonias whispered secrets to the neighboring trees in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The valonias stood tall and proud, like guardians of the Mediterranean region.
meanings.sent5: The rustling leaves of the valonias created a soothing melody in the breeze.
